abstract: In this article we derived an importent example of the inconsistentcountable set in second order ZF C (ZF C2) with the full second-order semantic.Main results is: (i) ¬Con(ZF C2), (ii) let k be an inaccessible cardinal and H k is a set of all sets having hereditary size less then k, then ¬Con(ZF C + (V = H k)).
meta: June 2015British Journal of Mathematics & Computer Science 9(5)
